channel.title: Help with making ::pickup Admin command only
channel.description:
How do you make ::pickup xxxx x an Administrator command only... Or actually make it only work for the owner via else if "if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Rob")"?
Please someone help me out with this, I want to make Partyhats and other rares discontinued but everyone is spawning them! :(

item.title: Help with making ::pickup Admin command only
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

How about this:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAME") { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

Read full topic
item.source: Help with making ::pickup Admin command only
